chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Make a joyful noise unto the LORD, all ye lands.
items.plainText: Make a joyful noise unto the LORD, all ye lands.

items.text: Serve the LORD with gladness: come before his presence with singing.
items.plainText: Serve the LORD with gladness: come before his presence with singing.

items.text: Know ye that the LORD he is God: it is he that hath made us, and not we ourselves; we are his people, and the sheep of his pasture.
items.plainText: Know ye that the LORD he is God: it is he that hath made us, and not we ourselves; we are his people, and the sheep of his pasture.

items.text: Enter into his gates with thanksgiving, and into his courts with praise: be thankful unto him, and bless his name.
items.plainText: Enter into his gates with thanksgiving, and into his courts with praise: be thankful unto him, and bless his name.

items.text: For the LORD is good; his mercy is everlasting; and his truth endureth to all generations.
items.plainText: For the LORD is good; his mercy is everlasting; and his truth endureth to all generations.
